title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: January 21, 2023, 05:05:53 PMLast edit: June 22, 2023, 03:36:02 PM by julerz12
content: SparkFi bounty campaign has officially ended. The SparkFi team decided to cut short the bounty campaign duration from 4 weeks to just 2 weeks due to recent project changes. (Read here: https://t.me/Jcampaigns/41267)The spreadsheet will now be finalized and bounty rewards will be distributed within 1 to 2 weeks after this bounty campaign has ended.SparkFi is currently on hold for the rewards distribution as the team is undecided whether they want to continue for further weeks or run a new campaign for FloraChain. Waiting for the team's final decision......[ WEBSITE ]...[ TWITTER ]...[ DISCORD ]...[ TELEGRAM GROUP ]...[ TELEGRAM CHANNEL ]...[ ANN THREAD ]......Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign), invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO), or use their platform at your own risk.

comments.author: julerz12
comments.created_time: January 21, 2023, 05:06:14 PMLast edit: February 05, 2023, 03:07:54 PM by julerz12
comments.body: .....[ WEBSITE ]...[ TWITTER ]...[ DISCORD ]...[ TELEGRAM GROUP ]...[ TELEGRAM CHANNEL ]...[ ANN THREAD ]......IMPORTANT!!WEEKLY REPORTS FOR TWITTER CAMPAIGN MUST BE SUBMITTED THROUGH THE REPORT FORM. [SEE THE 1ST POST ABOVE FOR THE REPORT FORM LINK]WEEKLY DEADLINE FOR REPORT SUBMISSION: SUNDAY [UTC]WEEKLY REPORTS POSTED ON THIS BOUNTY THREAD WILL NOT BE CHECKED/ACCEPTED/COUNTED AND WILL BE DELETED TO AVOID UNNECESSARY SPAM POSTS.....PROOF OF AUTHENTICATION POST FORMAT....Fill up the format below and post it on this bounty thread for verification purposes.[ Mandatory to all bounty campaign participants ]Code:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username: Bitcointalk Profile Link: Telegram Username:Campaign Category Participated: BSC Wallet Address:....WEEKLY DATES....WEEK 1 [ 1/23 - 1/29 ].....  WEEK 2 [ 1/30 - 2/5 ] Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign) or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
